title: Google\Analytics\Data\V1alpha\OrderBy\PivotOrderBy\PivotSelection
name: PivotSelection
description:
A pair of dimension names and values. Rows with this dimension pivot pair are ordered by the metric's value.

For example if pivots = {{"browser", "Chrome"}} and metric_name = "Sessions", then the rows will be sorted based on Sessions in Chrome. --------- ---------- ---------------- ---------- ---------------- Chrome Chrome Safari Safari
Country Sessions Pages/Sessions Sessions Pages/Sessions
--------- ---------- ---------------- ---------- ----------------
US 2 2 3 1
--------- ---------- ---------------- ---------- ----------------
Canada 3 1 4 1
--------- ---------- ---------------- ---------- ----------------

Generated from protobuf message google.analytics.data.v1alpha.OrderBy.PivotOrderBy.PivotSelection

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message
